inputs Package¶

dataenvelope Module¶

Created on Oct 10, 2012

@author: Gary

class housemonitor.inputs.dataenvelope.DataEnvelope(type='xbee', packet={}, arrival_time=<lib.getdatetime.GetDateTime object at 0x0000000004016F60>, data={})[source]¶

Bases: object

This object will be used to pass data through queues between threads.

arrival_time = <lib.getdatetime.GetDateTime object at 0x00000000040167F0>¶

The arrival time of the data.

data = {}¶

Additional data such as it source.

packet = None¶

The data.

type = 'xbee'¶

THe type of data that is being passed.

iinput Module¶

inputqueue Module¶

Created on Sep 20, 2012

@author: Gary

class housemonitor.inputs.inputqueue.InputQueue[source]¶

Bases: lib.base.Base, object

classdocs

INPUT_QUEUE_SIZE = 100¶
logger_name[source]¶

Set the logger level. This needs to be added to house_monitoring_logging.conf

receive()[source]¶

remove packet from input queue.

This routine will remove a packet from the input queue for processing.

args:
None
returns
packet
exceptions
None
side effect
Will block if no packets are availiable
transmit(packet, priority=5)[source]¶

Add packet to input queue.

This is the input queue that all incoming messages will go though. messages are added on the input side and then processed on the out going side.

args:
packet: a data packet with the data to be processed
returns:
none
exceptions:
none
side effects:
may block if gueue is full

processinput Module¶

Created on Oct 10, 2012

@author: Gary

class housemonitor.inputs.processinput.ProcessInput(input_queue)[source]¶

Bases: housemonitor.inputs.abc_input.abcInput

This class will remove the data off the input queue, determine the the the of data and pass the data to the correct routine to futher process the data

commands = {}¶

A dictionary used to direct incoming data.

configuration_file_name[source]¶
devices = {}¶

A dictionary containing information about input devices.

forever = True¶

Controls the main loop in the input function.

input()[source]¶

The input routine will receive data from the xbee thead via the queue. Do some preliminary processing and publish the data via the pub/sub package.

logger_name[source]¶
topic_name[source]¶
work()[source]¶

Processing for the main loop.

  1. Remove the data from the input_queue
  2. Send the data to the object for processing.
class housemonitor.inputs.processinput.ProcessStatusRequests(devices)[source]¶

Bases: housemonitor.inputs.processinput.abcProcessInput

devices = {}¶
logger_name[source]¶
process(envelope)[source]¶

Process a packet received from the XBee. This involves the following: #. get the addresses from the header #. get the data out of the packet #. get information about the source of the data #. send each packet using the pub/sub system

Parameters:packet – a packet recived from the XBee radio and decomposed by the ZigBee module
Returns:None
Raises :None
class housemonitor.inputs.processinput.ProcessXBeeInput(devices)[source]¶

Bases: housemonitor.inputs.processinput.abcProcessInput

This class will receive an XBee packet, strip the pertinate data out, and send it allong to be processed.

devices = {}¶
logger_name[source]¶
process(envelope)[source]¶

Process a envelope received from the XBee. This involves the following: 1. get the addresses from the header 2. get the data out of the packet 3. get information about the source of the data 4. send each packet using the pub/sub system

Args: :param envelope: a packet received from the XBee radio and decomposed by the ZigBee module :type DataEnvelope: Return: None :Raises: None
